Text: From Spain - is't in spanish? (with "bad" english sub)

orione, I dont think you will be disappointed with Welles as Falstaff....And that last scene of final rejection is his best scene ever, I think. Will look for that book you mention - Falstaff is a very funny character! But i hope he doesnt make too many apologies for Hal....

Abrix: The audio is english - all i meant was that Shakespeare english can be hard to follow, if youre untrained in it. Dubbing films into foreign languages is a crime, or would be in this case - Welles' voice is always half the show.

pippin, no words are enough to thank you for these quality films.
you really should join DV, it is the (other) place for ppl like you and orione.

Hi azazelo, Glad u enjoy them! Im already at DV, but i think it got to be a little less interesting site after the MPAA-crackdown. Theres still plenty of good stuff there, of course. But most of these Welles films couldnt go up there - thankfully everything goes in Scandinavia (americans have no clue what "liberal" really means!).

Great!!! Thanks! Havent seen this in 15 years...

What is this DV cineast site your talking about?
DV is delirium vault. But i think theyve closed for sign-ups.

Any who can seed
Orson Welles - The Lady From Shanghai
We are stuck at 99.5%
Can anyone come and seed The Lady From Shanghai, stuck at 99%
a seed would be nice... anyone?
Seeders please? I would very much like to see this film.
